About.paragraph: I'm Jhonatan, I'm 26 years old and I'm driven to learn things that will make me grow both professionally and personally. My career, which has taken me from repo man to guesthouse manager, is a reflection of my determination and dedication. The leaders I've had along the way have always highlighted my ability to be a great leader, and I'm constantly looking for new challenges to keep evolving and contributing to the success of the projects I embrace.
